name: Zook Adventure
description:
Zook Adventure is a platformer game available for desktop and mobile.

This is a solo developed project that took me a few months to complete. I initially wanted to add much more content, but eventually I decided to release it in a "more than a prototype but not quite complete" state rather than to keep it on my hard drive. Much more could be added, even trivial things like a pause system or a levels selection, but despite everything, I'm happy with the final result.

✨KEY FEATURES ✨
  • Hand-drawn sprites and animations
  • Jumps, attacks and dodges in an action platformer
  • Four different types of enemies
  • Coins collection!
